short_summary: Supply, delivery and installation of prefabricated phone booth furniture products.
description: **Canada Economic Development for Quebec regions has a requirement for the supply, delivery and installation of prefabricated phone booth furniture products, including one (1) single occupancy enclosed booths (small) and one (1) single occupancy enclosed booth (medium). All items must be delivered to Montreal (Qc) and installed in Drummondville (Qc).**
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Basics

*   **Title:** Prefabricated Phone Booth Furniture
*   **GSIN Code:** *None*
*   **Procurement Category:** *Government Department*
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number:** cb-152-47423719
*   **Solicitation Number:** 9K001-S24-0130
*   **Publication Date:** December 13, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 12, 2024 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Time)
*   **Amendment Number:** 11
*   **Amendment Date:** January 12, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 26, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** March 1, 2024

#### Tender Requirements

*   The supply, delivery, and installation of prefabricated phone booth furniture products are required.
*   The products must include one (1) single occupancy enclosed booth (small) and one (1) single occupancy enclosed booth (medium).
*   The deliverables must be received on or before March 1, 2024.
*   The installation of the deliverables must be completed on or before March 1, 2024.

#### Contracting Entity

*   **Name:** Canada Economic Development for Quebec Regions
*   **Address:** 800 Boulevard René-Lévesque Ouest, Montréal, Québec H3B 1X9, Canada
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Cecilia Phuong Thu Ho
    *   Email: cecilia-phuong-thu.ho@dec-ced.gc.ca
    *   Phone: (514) 346-8484

#### Download Attachments

*   The tender notice and associated documents can be downloaded from the following links:
    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27395/amendment-002--9k001-s24-0130.pdf
    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27395/9k001-s24-0130-rfp_0.pdf
    *   https://canadabuys.canada
